skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.
A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.
Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death (300)

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Gate of Slaanesh"
Ability number of uses: +2 for "Gate of Slaanesh"

skillTree.localised_description: This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: This obsession with murder is just cheap, mindless bloodlust of the basest kind. To the servants of Slaanesh, there's so much more to life… and to death too, of course.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Khornate factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Khornate factions

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: You do not have a will.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +1% for characters
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
The warhost seeks glories for the Dark Gods, erecting perverse monuments to earn their favor.
All manner of terrible, twisted artifacts can be found.
No price is too small for the Gods.

effects.description:
Character experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

Character experience gain per turn: +200
	(Lord's army)

Character experience gain per turn: +300
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The southern races are weak. Their souls and monuments will be offered to the Gods in equal measure!

Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.localised_description: There is a price to all things, a cost which has been determined by the Gods and will be exacted from those with the courage to strike a deal.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.
My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: I can procure anything an agent might need for any mission.
I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

skillTree.localised_description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!
We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Slaanesh corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Slaanesh corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Slaanesh corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: When you can speak their language, convincing weak-willed mortals to give in to their base desires and gift their souls to Slaanesh is, unsurprisingly, quite an easy thing to do.

effects.description: Establish Cult action: -10% cost to perform
Establish Cult action: -20% cost to perform
Establish Cult action: -30% cost to perform

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This one's polished, perfectly glossy smoothness enables them to glide across land, sea or air, for they are truly favoured by the Dark Prince, and swift to do His bidding.
Even the purest, most virtuous soul can be distorted to vile perversion or inveterate depravity if the right sort of temptation is offered.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: -25%
	(enemy armies in province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Come to me. Come to me! You know it is what you have always desired. All your life till now has been a desperate dream of me... awaken! Awaken, and come to me, for your reward awaits in my arms...

effects.description:

	(all units in army)

Speed: +10% for Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Vainglorious mortals granted the immortal power they crave – at the cost of everything they once were.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Leave those bows and come to me.
